name: Bice Ristorante
description: Internationally renowned upscale Italian restaurant offering spectacular harbor views and authentic Northern Italian cuisine with an elegant atmosphere.

tips.content: Request harbor view table when booking for spectacular water views
Internationally acclaimed restaurant with locations worldwide - authentic Northern Italian cuisine
Smart casual dress code enforced - upscale dining experience

name: Trattoria del Porto
description: Waterfront Italian restaurant offering modern Mediterranean cuisine with indoor and outdoor seating overlooking Harbor Piazza.

tips.content: Request outdoor seating for the best harbor views and people watching
Perfect spot for lunch after exploring the resort or before park visits
Features fresh Mediterranean flavors with modern Italian preparation

name: Mama Della's Ristorante
description: Authentic family-style Italian restaurant serving traditional dishes from Tuscany, Naples, and Piemonte in a warm, welcoming atmosphere.

tips.content: Perfect for families wanting authentic Italian comfort food in a cozy setting
Features recipes from different regions of Italy - try the handmade pasta
Great value for authentic Italian dining at the resort

name: Sal's Market Deli
description: Italian marketplace offering fresh deli meats, cheeses, antipasto, salads, and authentic wood-fired pizzas.

tips.content: Wood-fired pizzas are made fresh throughout the day - perfect for quick meals
Great for breakfast pastries, lunch sandwiches, or dinner pizza
Authentic Italian deli experience with imported meats and cheeses

name: Splendido Bar & Grill
description: Poolside restaurant and bar offering casual dining with burgers, salads, and light Italian specialties alongside tropical cocktails.

tips.content: Perfect for staying poolside all day with food and drinks delivered to your chair
Enjoy Italian-inspired poolside fare with harbor and beach views

name: Gelateria
description: Authentic Italian gelateria offering artisanal gelato, milkshakes, and smoothies made with premium ingredients.

tips.content: Authentic Italian gelato made fresh daily with rotating flavor selections
Perfect sweet treat while strolling the harbor or after dinner

name: The Kitchen
description: Signature restaurant featuring New American cuisine with rock and roll flair, offering creative dishes in an energetic atmosphere.

tips.content: Rock and roll themed fine dining with memorabilia throughout the restaurant
Popular with families and music lovers - book early for dinner
Creative New American dishes with playful rock-themed names

name: Palm Restaurant
description: Classic American steakhouse known for prime steaks, fresh lobster, and traditional New York-style dining experience.

tips.content: Famous steakhouse chain known for prime cuts and fresh lobster
Walls feature caricatures of celebrities and regular customers
Perfect for special occasions and steak lovers

name: Emack & Bolio's
description: Gourmet ice cream parlor offering unique flavors and premium ice cream with rock and roll attitude.

tips.content: Famous Boston-based ice cream chain with creative flavors
Try unique flavors like Deep Purple Chip or Grasshopper Pie

name: Beach Club
description: Poolside bar and grill offering casual dining with burgers, sandwiches, and tropical cocktails in a laid-back beach atmosphere.

tips.content: Perfect for pool day dining without leaving the water recreation area
Tropical cocktails and light meals in a relaxed rock-themed setting

name: Starbucks
description: Full-service Starbucks location offering specialty coffee, teas, pastries, and breakfast items with rock memorabilia decor.

tips.content: Use Starbucks mobile app for ordering and earning rewards
Rock memorabilia decorates this unique Starbucks location

name: Islands Dining Room
description: Pacific Rim restaurant offering breakfast buffet and dinner with island-inspired cuisine and tropical atmosphere.

tips.content: Breakfast buffet features both American and Asian-inspired dishes
Dinner menu focuses on Pacific Rim flavors with fresh seafood
Beautiful tropical setting perfect for relaxed family dining

name: Tuk Tuk Market
description: Grab-and-go marketplace in the hotel lobby offering coffee, pastries, sandwiches, and Asian-inspired snacks.

tips.content: Perfect for quick breakfast or snacks on the go to the parks
Features Asian-inspired options alongside American favorites

name: Wantilan Luau
description: Seasonal Polynesian dinner show featuring traditional food, music, and dance in an outdoor lagoon setting (seasonal operation).

tips.content: Seasonal operation - check availability when booking your stay
Authentic Polynesian dinner show with fire dancing and live music
Beautiful lagoon setting for a unique cultural dining experience

name: Bula Bar & Grille
description: Poolside bar and restaurant offering tropical cocktails, light meals, and island-inspired cuisine with lagoon views.

tips.content: Beautiful lagoon views while enjoying tropical drinks and light meals
Perfect for relaxing by the pool with Pacific-inspired flavors

name: Amatista Cookhouse
description: Caribbean-inspired restaurant featuring bold flavors, fresh seafood, and vibrant island cuisine with waterfall views.

tips.content: Features bold Caribbean flavors with fresh tropical ingredients
Request seating near windows for beautiful waterfall views
Excellent fresh seafood preparation with island spices

name: Strong Water Tavern
description: Rum-focused bar and lounge featuring over 50 different rums, Caribbean-inspired cocktails, and small plates.

tips.content: Over 50 different rums from around the Caribbean and beyond
Adults only venue - perfect for evening cocktails and conversation
Expert bartenders can recommend rums based on your taste preferences

name: New Dutch Trading Co.
description: Quick-service marketplace offering grab-and-go items, sandwiches, salads, and beverages in a tropical market setting.

tips.content: Use mobile ordering for faster service during busy park times
Convenient for quick breakfast or snacks before heading to parks

name: Drhum Club Kantine
description: Poolside bar and grill serving tropical cocktails, light meals, and Caribbean-inspired snacks with water views.

tips.content: Perfect for pool day dining with Caribbean-inspired flavors
Enjoy tropical cocktails while relaxing by the beautiful pool

name: Bar 17 Bistro
description: Rooftop bar and bistro on the 17th floor offering panoramic views of Universal Orlando and contemporary cuisine.

tips.content: Book sunset reservations for incredible views of Universal Orlando
Highest dining location at Universal Orlando with 360-degree views
Modern glass tower location offers unique perspective of theme parks

name: Urban Pantry
description: Modern quick-service food hall offering diverse cuisines including Asian, Latin, and American options with contemporary styling.

tips.content: Multiple cuisine stations offer something for everyone in the family
Use mobile ordering to skip lines and try different international options
Modern food hall concept with contemporary design and seating

name: Starbucks
description: Modern Starbucks location in the hotel lobby offering specialty coffee, teas, pastries, and breakfast items.

tips.content: Use Starbucks app for mobile ordering and rewards
Modern design complements the hotel's contemporary aesthetic

name: Bayliner Diner
description: 1950s-style food court featuring multiple stations with burgers, pizza, international cuisine, and desserts in a retro dining atmosphere.

tips.content: Multiple food stations offer variety - pizza, burgers, international, and desserts
Use mobile ordering during peak meal times to avoid long lines
Authentic 1950s diner atmosphere with period music and decor

name: Starbucks
description: Retro-themed Starbucks in the hotel lobby offering specialty coffee with 1950s design elements and beachside atmosphere.

tips.content: Unique retro design fits perfectly with resort's 1950s beach theme
Mobile order available through Starbucks app

name: Swizzle Lounge
description: Retro cocktail lounge in the hotel lobby serving classic cocktails with a modern twist in a 1950s-themed atmosphere.

tips.content: Classic cocktails with modern twists in authentic 1950s atmosphere
Perfect for evening drinks after a day at the theme parks

name: Galaxy Bowl Restaurant
description: Unique restaurant inside the resort's retro bowling alley serving burgers, pizza, and classic American fare.

tips.content: One-of-a-kind dining experience inside an actual bowling alley
Perfect for family entertainment night - bowl and dine together
Classic bowling alley food with burgers, pizza, and fries

name: The Hideaway Bar & Grill
description: Poolside bar and restaurant serving specialty drinks, light meals, and snacks with 1950s beach theming.

tips.content: Perfect for pool day dining without leaving the water recreation area
Retro beach atmosphere with specialty cocktails and light fare

name: Atomic Tonic
description: Additional poolside bar location serving tropical cocktails and refreshments with atomic-age theming.

tips.content: Convenient location near the lazy river for continuous pool enjoyment
Atomic-age themed cocktails and refreshments

name: Beach Break Cafe
description: Quick-service food court featuring multiple stations with American favorites, international options, and grab-and-go items.

tips.content: Multiple food stations provide variety at affordable prices
Use mobile ordering to save time during busy meal periods
Great value option with surf-themed atmosphere

name: Pier 8 Market
description: Food court offering breakfast, lunch, and dinner with affordable options in a relaxed beach-themed atmosphere.

tips.content: Affordable dining options perfect for budget-conscious families
Mobile ordering available for faster service
Relaxed beach atmosphere with comfortable seating

name: Sunset Lounge
description: Hotel lobby lounge offering a variety of cocktails, wines, and beers in a casual beach-themed setting.

tips.content: Casual spot for evening drinks at value resort pricing
Beach-themed decor complements the resort's coastal atmosphere

name: Pool Bars (Oasis Beach Bar & Wave Maker's)
description: Two poolside bars serving tropical drinks and light refreshments with beachside service to pool chairs.

tips.content: Two convenient locations ensure drinks are always nearby while swimming
Tropical drinks served to pool chairs for ultimate relaxation

name: Flora Taverna
description: Signature Mediterranean restaurant featuring fresh, authentic dishes with emphasis on Greek and Italian flavors and Epic Universe views.

tips.content: NEW 2025 - Book early as this is the premier dining at Universal's newest deluxe hotel
Features authentic Mediterranean cuisine with views of Epic Universe
Emphasis on fresh, high-quality ingredients and traditional preparation

name: Bar Helios
description: Rooftop bar overlooking Epic Universe offering craft cocktails, wine, and small plates with panoramic theme park views.

tips.content: NEW 2025 - Prime location for Epic Universe views and sunset cocktails
Rooftop location offers unparalleled views of Universal's newest theme park
Arrive early for sunset views and best seating options

name: Aurora Market
description: Upscale coffee shop and marketplace offering Starbucks coffee, pastries, grab-and-go items, and light meals.

tips.content: NEW 2025 - Upscale market with premium grab-and-go options
Perfect for quick breakfast before early Epic Universe access
Mobile ordering available for convenience

name: Lotus Lagoon
description: Poolside bar and grill offering tropical cocktails, light meals, and upscale poolside dining with lagoon theming.

tips.content: NEW 2025 - Upscale poolside dining matching the hotel's premium level
Tropical cocktails and elevated poolside fare

name: Cosmos Cafe & Market
description: Quick-service restaurant and market featuring high-quality international cuisine with stellar space theming and excellent food quality.

tips.content: OPENED 2025 - Reviewers call this some of the best resort quick-service food
Try the salmon fried rice, pulled pork sandwich, or eggs Benedict
Space-themed atmosphere with stellar food quality

name: Galaxy Bar & Grill
description: Poolside bar and restaurant offering refreshments and meals with celestial theming and space-inspired cocktails.

tips.content: OPENED 2025 - Space-themed poolside dining with cosmic cocktails
Perfect for pool relaxation with celestial atmosphere

name: Omega Cafe & Market
description: Adventure-themed quick-service restaurant serving breakfast, lunch, and dinner with planetary theming and hearty portions.

tips.content: OPENED 2025 - Try the Big French Dipper or Earth Shake Fried Chicken Sandwich
Adventure and planetary themed menu and atmosphere
Mobile ordering available for convenience

name: Luna Bar
description: Evening cocktail lounge featuring lunar libations with creative cocktails inspired by space exploration and celestial themes.

tips.content: OPENED 2025 - Try the Hyperion (bourbon cocktail) or Io (gin cocktail)
Creative lunar-themed cocktails with space exploration inspiration
Perfect evening spot for space-themed cocktails

name: Moonrise Bar & Grill
description: Poolside bar and restaurant offering space-themed refreshments and meals with lunar atmosphere and cosmic cocktails.

tips.content: OPENED 2025 - Space-themed poolside dining with cosmic atmosphere
Perfect for poolside relaxation with lunar-inspired refreshments
